trans-unit.source: Specifies whether a column type is visible in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> designer.
trans-unit.target: 指定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 設計工具中是否可以看見資料行型別。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: By default, types derived from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn> appear in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control-specific parts of the Visual Studio designer, but inherit a <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignTimeVisibleAttribute> of <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignTimeVisibleAttribute.No> to prevent them from appearing in other parts of the designer.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，類型衍生自<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>會出現在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項專屬組件的 Visual Studio 設計工具中，但繼承<xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignTimeVisibleAttribute>的<xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignTimeVisibleAttribute.No>，防止它們出現在設計工具的其他部分。

trans-unit.source: This is necessary because the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn> type implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent> interface, which normally makes an instance of the type appear in the designer.
trans-unit.target: 這是必要的因為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>型別會實作<xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent>介面，它通常使類型執行個體出現在設計工具中。

trans-unit.source: Use this attribute to prevent a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn> type from appearing in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control-specific designer.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免使用這個屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>類型出現在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>特定控制項設計工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需屬性用法的詳細資訊，請參閱[屬性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute" /> class using the default <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible" /> property value of <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see langword="true" /> 的預設 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute" /> 屬性值來初始化 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible" /> property.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible" /> 屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute" /> class using the specified value to initialize the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute" /> 屬性的指定預設值，初始化 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The default <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute" /> value, which is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Yes" />, indicating that the column is visible in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> designer.
trans-unit.target: 預設的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute" /> 值 (亦即 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Yes" />)，表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 設計工具中可以看到資料行。

trans-unit.source: This attribute instance has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible%2A> property value of `true`.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的執行個體具有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible%2A>屬性值為`true`。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to compare with the current <see cref="T:System.Object" />.
trans-unit.target: 與目前的 <see cref="T:System.Object" /> 相比較的 <see cref="T:System.Object" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this object is equivalent to the specified object.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出此物件是否相當於指定的物件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate that the specified object is a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute" /> instance with the same <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible" /> property value as this instance; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示指定的物件是一個具有與這個執行個體相同 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute" /> 屬性值的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible" /> 執行個體，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: 傳回這個執行個體的雜湊碼。

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer hash code.
trans-unit.target: 32 位元帶正負號的整數雜湊碼。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this attribute instance is equal to the <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Default" /> attribute value.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出這個屬性執行個體是否等於 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Default" /> 屬性值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate that this instance is equal to the <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Default" /> instance; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示這個執行個體等於 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Default" /> 執行個體，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute" /> value indicating that the column is not visible in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> designer.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute" /> 值，表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 設計工具中看不到資料行。

trans-unit.source: This attribute instance has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible%2A> property value of `false`.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的執行個體具有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible%2A>屬性值為`false`。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the column type is visible in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> designer.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 設計工具中是否可以看見資料行型別。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate that the column type is visible in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> designer; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 設計工具中可以看見資料行型別，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute" /> value indicating that the column is visible in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> designer.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute" /> 值，表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 設計工具中可以看見資料行。

trans-unit.source: This attribute instance has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible%2A> property value of `true`.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的執行個體具有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible%2A>屬性值為`true`。
